title: Mercedes : market share of new car registrations in the EU 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The highest Month Sep 18 has 2.6 more Market share than the lowest Month Aug 18.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The highest Month Sep 18 has 2.6 more Market share than the lowest Month Aug 18.
max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
Month Sep 19 has the second highest value for Market share.
There is a difference of 2.6 between the maximum Month Sep 18 and minimum Month Aug 18.
Market share at Month Sep 18 is 7.2 , second place is Sep 19 at 6.9, and thirdly is Oct 18 at 6.8.
Over the past 17 Months, the Market share has declined.
Month May 19, Feb 19, and Jan 19 have a similar Market share that is 5.3.
The highest value 7.2 at Sep 18 is almost 1.23 times larger than the average value 5.85.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 99.5.
